programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, “Bridges Aflame.” Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope. He was practicing for the tug of war game and didn't realise that his beak was so sharp! Now he can't take part in the game! Clever Noddy shows Scurvy how he can take still be a part of the game - by cheerleading! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman follows a lead to find his missing brother, he dives headlong into a twisted underworld of squatters and vagrants that threatens to tear apart his family as he struggles to maintain his sanity.

programme.title: The Master (2013)
programme.desc: When martial arts master Chen Xiang refuses to join the armies of the Qing Prince, his mother and his students are seized. To save them, Chen has only one path: all-out war.

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.

programme.title: Death Forest 4

programme.title: Decision To Leave

programme.title: Hide And Never Seek

programme.title: The Master (Jet Li)

programme.title: Contorted
programme.desc: After tragedy, a family moves to a new house outside of the city, only to find the house was cheap due to unorthodox reasons.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves… and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, “Bridges Aflame.” Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope. He was practicing for the tug of war game and didn't realise that his beak was so sharp! Now he can't take part in the game! Clever Noddy shows Scurvy how he can take still be a part of the game - by cheerleading! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. programme.title: Go Dog Go!

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes’ famous Pupclairs. programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Tuli
programme.desc: Tuli centers on Daisy, daughter of the town’s sole manunuli or circumciser who has questions about her sexuality.

programme.title: Tatsulok
programme.desc: Luzviminda (Elizabeth Oropesa), an Olongapo bargirl, was gang-raped by five American servicemen. The result of that molestation was a daughter whose father she did not know, and whom she later gave up for adoption.

programme.title: Co-Ed Scandal
programme.desc: The Co-Ed Scandal: two girls and a boy of barely legal age are caught having sex on tape. The film draws answers from the urban legends that grew around the controversial sex videos and the result is a humorous narrative with elements of mock documentary.

programme.title: Beks Days of Our Lives
programme.desc: Richardson (Chad Kinis), Reggie (Lassy Marquez) and Melvin (MC Calaquian) have have been friends for many years despite working in different fields. They decided to go on a vacation, finding themselves in hilarious situations. Everything's going perfectly well until the night Reggie collapses.

programme.title: Edward
programme.desc: Edward, Thop Nazareno's sophomore coming of age feature, is a testament to a teenager finding self-actualization in the reality of a Philippine public hospital setting.

programme.title: Dito Sa Puso Ko
programme.desc: Ligaya Tatlonghari (Judy Ann Santos) is a movie fan in every sense of the word--she eats and breathes showbiz. She has two foremost dreams: to travel to the United States, and to join her favorite TV game show.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.
Anton and Erika have been a couple for 12 years already. While he's not yet ready to get married, Erika waits until he is and lovingly devotes her time to him.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: A washed up actress and former child star Jane Pineda (Bela Padilla), battles with love, chances and alcoholism as her career plummets to rock bottom.

programme.title: Bullet Day
programme.desc: A former hit man trying to live a normal life when someone from his past sees him and puts his family and friends in danger. Can he sacrifice his new life to fight for the ones he loves?

programme.title: The Mall, The Merrier
programme.desc: Two siblings, Moira (Vice Ganda) and Morissette (Anne Curtis), feud over Tamol Mall, a mall they inherited. The feud is compounded with the arrival of their Aunt Moody.

programme.title: Tragic Theater
programme.desc: A team of exorcists are sent into an old theater that is rumored to have been the site of a great tragedy during its construction.

programme.title: This Time
programme.desc: Coby and Ava only see each other during summer vacations. As time passes, the two develop feelings for each other but having a relationship long-distance is a great challenge for both.

programme.title: Columbo S6 E01 - Fade In To Murder
programme.desc: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.However, beneath all that comical exterior was probably the most dogged investigator in the Los Angeles Police Department.

programme.title: Married With Children S1 E08 - Peggy Sue Got Work
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married… With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: Stephen King's IT E01 - Part I
programme.desc: IT rises from dank, dark places. IT preys on children. IT knows exactly what scares you--and IT never goes away.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S10 E08 - Persona
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E04 - The Hunt
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: CSI S3 E09 - Blood Lust
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E01 - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Callie North (Season 3), Amos Rodriguez (Season 7), and Lucas Miller (Season 1) are challenged by Joel van der Loon (Season 7) to create two projectiles capable of taking down large game.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: What would you do if you were stranded in the wilderness with what was in your pockets? Joel van der Loon (Season 7), Clay Hayes (Season 8 winner), and Lucas Miller (Season 1) find out with this challenge.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the remaining survivalists near day 50, conditions at Reindeer Lake intensify. Desperation rises as the temperatures continue to drop, and personal demons bubble to the surface.

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3)
programme.desc: Troy and Pickle track a high-tech snake. Bill and Tes search for a new hot spot. Dusty discovers one of his favourite honey holes has changed forever. Zak and Bruce chase the snakes and get a surprise.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2)
programme.desc: Some of the most painful animals can be found in your own backyard. Rob and Adam take on an assassin bug, a Jerusalem cricket, and the brown widow spider - producing a record-setting episode of pain.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The fellowship is stunned when evidence suggests that a dam lies buried at the end of the swamp, corroborating both Fred Nolan's theory and Zena Halpern's Templar map.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Daniel and Dorien call in air support. Meanwhile, Ronnie and Ashley compete in a battle of the sexes. Black Rambo hunts for a legendary payday. While Bruce tries to save his season.

programme.title: Hidden Cities (S2)
programme.desc: We journey deep into the rugged geography of this legendary Indonesian island and come face to face with a cannibalistic tribe - the Bataks.

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: Reputasyon
programme.desc: What a nice schoolgirl like Miya Brown (Mia Nolasco) doing in a club as G.R.O.? She has learned that there is life beyond her mother's world and that of her father's.

programme.title: Swindler's List
programme.desc: Leo and Niño were the swindlers in this wacky tale. But only because of a very good reason: to provide a home for the orphanage. The duo decided to raise money by swindling the rich to give to the poor.

programme.title: Kahit Sa Bala Kakapit Ako
programme.desc: Friendship comes to a test in this tale about the mild-mannered Efren and Nestor, the member of an underground rebel group. Efren became unwittingly involved with Nestor's activities when he was put under suspicion.

programme.title: Dapat Ka Bang Mahalin?
programme.desc: The story, which was based on a popular comic’s serial, closely resembled what would later happen in real life to local moviedom's favorite couple. Sharon and Gabby portrayed teenagers who eloped and got married against the advice of everybody.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Hulihin Si Boy Amores
programme.desc: A former policeman defies the law and meets a violent death.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Angelito San Miguel At Ang Mga Batang City Jail
programme.desc: Angelito leads a group of young ex-convicts who will risk going back to prison in order to fight a notorious syndicate.

programme.title: Pinagbiyak Na Bunga (Lookalayk)
programme.desc: Watching Andrew E and Chiquito together as they play the parts of con-men who might indeed be father and son.

programme.title: Huwag Mong Itanong Kung Bakit
programme.desc: Aning (Cherie Gil) is a maid in the Cuevas household. She is raped by an unknown assailant and comes home to the province pregnant. Her older sister Dinya (Dina Bonnevie) serves the Cuevas household to search for the culprit.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: AMAMI: Island Colors
programme.desc: Experience the colors of Amami Oshima in beautiful time-lapse footage. Unique hues include "Amami Blue" ocean waters and the glossy black of silk thread that's painstakingly dyed using wood and mud.

programme.title: Journeys in Japan
programme.desc: We explore Chichibu, a rustic area near Tokyo that is famous for its many festivals, including a 400 year-old spectacle involving colorful handmade rockets.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Hirosaki City in Aomori Prefecture is known for its Western architecture. A piano is placed inside the station, and people stop to play from their heart.

programme.title: DEEPER LOOK
programme.desc: China's pressure in the South China Sea and Taiwan Strait is increasing uncertainties in the Indo-Pacific region. Former US Deputy Secretary of State Richard Armitage offers his insights.

programme.title: Dig More Japan
programme.desc: After 55 years, the World Expo is returning to Osaka, bringing renewed global attention. We dig a little deeper into this amazing city!

programme.title: Dining With the Chef mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: Tempura Udon Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Experience the fascinating sights of the airports and transport hubs which connect Japan with the world. Time-lapse photography will show you how these places bustle with activity around the clock.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef
programme.desc: Discover how sashimi can be served as Italian carpaccio, with a Japanese twist. Plus, we'll use butter and soy sauce to boost the flavor of mushrooms. Enjoy Chef Rika's eye-opening recipes!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: AMAMI: Biodiversity
programme.desc: Amami Oshima is a World Natural Heritage Site, with rare flora and fauna including many endemic species. Explore the biodiversity of its lush, subtropical forests in stunning time-lapse footage.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Noda Hideki received the Distinguished Artist Award from the International Society for the Performing Arts in 2023. In this two-part interview, he talks about theater that transcends boundaries.

programme.title: 1/50: People Who Lost A Newborn
programme.desc: 1 in 50 families have lost a child during pregnancy or soon after birth. A couple who lost their second son when two hours old talks about their grief and sorrow, a topic often not discussed in Japan.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, a perfect distillation of craftsmanship: Gunchomon Hyogo-gusari no Tachi.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Summer Delicacy
programme.desc: A group of anglers stand in a fast-moving, undulating river at the foot of a rugged cliff. They use "drifting mosquito hooks" to fish for a summer delicacy that was a favorite of the Edo townspeople.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Japan's logistics industry is struggling with a new cap on truck driver working hours. The government is trying to address the issue, but some say the solution is for consumers to change their habits.

programme.title: Document 72 hours
programme.desc: A national road winds through a rugged mountain range on the Kii Peninsula. We drove the length of this road over three days to meet some of the residents in this remote region.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Participants of the Hyoge Festival clown around in fun, silly costumes. It originated as a sly way of thanking a local hero, who built reservoirs but was exiled in the 17th century.

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make shinoda rolls with taro stalks, a simple fall dish suitable for festive occasions.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: Prof. Jun Takahashi succeeded Nobel laureate Prof. Shinya Yamanaka as director of Kyoto University's CiRA. Find out the goals under the new leadership as we look at the latest research on iPS cells.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Shirasu are baby Japanese anchovies. Known for their clear, silvery-white appearance, these tiny things are packed with umami and nutrients.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: Journeys in Japan
programme.desc: We explore Chichibu, a rustic area near Tokyo that is famous for its many festivals, including a 400 year-old spectacle involving colorful handmade rockets.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin."

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the spring dates of seimei and kokuu. The temple chefs show us how to make two seasonal specialties, yomogi rice cakes and bamboo shoots mixed with sansho leaves.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work "The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei."

programme.title: Dive in Tokyo
programme.desc: Komagome is the birthplace of Somei-yoshino, the most popular cherry blossom variety in Japan. We visit a scenic garden, meet locals who cultivate cherry tree saplings, and explore shopping streets.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple show us how to make a simple fall treat that's both beautiful to look at and tasty to eat. Just boil edible chrysanthemums and serve with sweet vinegar.

programme.title: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean
programme.desc: Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: A Squirrely Situation / Sleepover Strategy
programme.desc: The hamsters vow to stop a mysterious thief from stealing their Num-Nugget deliveries. // During a sleepover, the hamsters try to reunite Harry with his beloved stuffed animal.

programme.title: Robots in Space
programme.desc: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: The Great Pizza Race
programme.desc: It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window.

programme.title: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali’s train from a rockslide!

programme.title: Pups Save a Wild Ride
programme.desc: Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: A Guayabera For Tico / Falling Estrella's
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it on the way to Tico's house. // Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky, but it loses three stars! Dora has to get them back in time.

programme.title: Doctor Drama / The White Whale
programme.desc: After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: A Not So Grand Opening
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Grampy Rabbit in Space
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa's Circus
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: The Fish Pond
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: The Olden Days
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Grandpa's Little Train
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called “Gertrude” and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that “Gertrude” is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: School Bus Trip
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Pen Pal
programme.desc: Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Granny and Granpa's Attic
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: Mail Truck Blaze
programme.desc: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window.

programme.title: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer
programme.desc: After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: The Trouble with Bunny Slugs / Life with Chumby
programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School
programme.desc: Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. // Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure
programme.desc: Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show
programme.desc: Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!

programme.title: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble
programme.desc: Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: The Blaze Family
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Turon / Matzo Ball Soup
programme.desc: When the Stump receives a delivery of an unknown fruit, Detectives Chef and Olly must solve the mystery of what it is before they can cook it. // When the gang gets the sneezles, it's up to Olly to finish the matzo ball soup without an exact recipe.

programme.title: Fish Fiesta Freakout
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog, Family
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Days of Summer
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.desc: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: George's Balloon
programme.desc: George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Pirate Treasure
programme.desc: Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Mystery Present
programme.desc: Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Popcorn / Banana
programme.desc: Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: Pasta & Sauce
programme.desc: Chef and Olly just made fresh pasta, so they make Brody Bambino's slow-roasted sauce to go with it - emphasis on the slow!

programme.title: Robots in Space
programme.desc: When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window.

programme.title: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay, but who will save them from all the mayhem she causes? // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Cali’s train from a rockslide!

programme.title: Pups Save a Wild Ride
programme.desc: Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: A Guayabera For Tico / Falling Estrella's
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it on the way to Tico's house. // Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky, but it loses three stars! Dora has to get them back in time.

programme.title: Doctor Drama / The White Whale
programme.desc: After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.title: A Not So Grand Opening
programme.desc: When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: The Fast and The Fishy
programme.desc: Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Grampy Rabbit in Space
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa's Circus
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: The Fish Pond
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: The Olden Days
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Grandpa's Little Train
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called “Gertrude” and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard. Peppa and George think that “Gertrude” is the very best train in the whole world

programme.title: School Bus Trip
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes. After a great day out, the bus takes the children home

programme.title: Pen Pal
programme.desc: Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Granny and Granpa's Attic
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure
programme.desc: Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thésée", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: Mail Truck Blaze
programme.desc: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window.

programme.title: Pups Save a White Wolf / Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer
programme.desc: After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. // Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole where they run into some crocodiles?

programme.title: The Trouble with Bunny Slugs / Life with Chumby
programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School
programme.desc: Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. // Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure
programme.desc: Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show
programme.desc: Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!

programme.title: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble
programme.desc: Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble and is heading straight for a volcano! Dora has to do a mid-air rescue to save him.

programme.title: The Blaze Family
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Turon / Matzo Ball Soup
programme.desc: When the Stump receives a delivery of an unknown fruit, Detectives Chef and Olly must solve the mystery of what it is before they can cook it. // When the gang gets the sneezles, it's up to Olly to finish the matzo ball soup without an exact recipe.

programme.title: Fish Fiesta Freakout
programme.desc: Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog, Family
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Days of Summer
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: The Trouble with Bunny Slugs / Life with Chumby
programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: The Show Must Flow On
programme.desc: When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists
programme.desc: Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor
programme.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window.

programme.title: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws
programme.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Tongue Twisted Troll / Chompy and the Cloud Flower
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Grumpy Old Troll untwist his tongue with Quickatoo's help. // Dora and Boots help Chompy find another Cloud Flower Seed after he accidentally eats Isa's.

programme.title: Double Dare You / Roy
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Guy Ritchie's The Covenant
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie’s The Covenant follows US Army Sergeant John Kinley and Afghan interpreter Ahmed. After an ambush, Ahmed goes to Herculean lengths to save Kinley’s life.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 16
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test hacks for getting free parking, and Kevin finds the best hack for peeling eggs. Plus, Brooke combats shrinking sweaters, and Pitch Man shares the best hacks for cooking like a pro.

programme.title: Caught! (Season 2) S2 3
programme.desc: Security cameras in front yards, backyards and street corners capture crimes, mishaps and earth-shattering moments like break-ins and hit-and-runs. It's up to local law enforcement to save the day.

programme.title: Caught! (Season 2) S2 4
programme.desc: Whether a crook on trial takes flight or an inmate gets cozy with a corrections officer, handcuffs and prison walls are no match for rebellious convicts who make last-ditch efforts to break free.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 1
programme.desc: Contestants from all walks of life compete for glory and $25,000 cash in an arena unlike any other.

programme.title: Arrow S2 9
programme.desc: After a seemingly impossible robbery at Queen Consolidated, Central City's police scientist Barry Allen (GRANT GUSTIN) offers to help Oliver and his team.

programme.title: East New York S1 8
programme.desc: When four party-goers fatally overdose, the 7-4’s investigation is impeded by an ongoing DEA operation, and Haywood asks Suarez for help. Also, Yenko deals with tension at home.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 5
programme.desc: Maniac Matt is out to prove a point in the port of Oakland. He gambles early on a container full of liquor, then drives up prices forcing everyone else to pony up.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 5
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys say all the wrong things when conducting sensitivity training, have unexpected celebrity sightings on the street, and are forced into being unreceptive receptionists in a busy office.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 17
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test the best hacks for beating a motion detector. Plus, secrets for hacking French manicures and beach hair, keeping your dog off the lawn, and making a frittata out of leftover pizza are revealed.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 18
programme.desc: Dr. Hack is back with the most unexpected ways to cure burns, toothaches, and migraines. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test the best hacks for maintaining rock star hair, cooking an omelet in a bag, and gaming the carnival system.

programme.desc: Most of the world is uncharted wilderness & untamed backcountry full of rugged terrain & wild inhabitants. It takes a special kind of police officer to survive and thrive as they take down criminals.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: No Ordinary Rescue S2
programme.desc: More than 10 million people in China suffer from Alzheimer's, 500,000 are missing elderly. In a race against time, a group of volunteers in Beijing have come together to find the missing elderly.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day’s events.

programme.title: Sour, Salty & Alive
programme.desc: The humble rice - a white grain that's always in our diet. But a magical transformation from fermentation creates a myriad of amazing flavours.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent
programme.desc: They're your eyes and ears around the globe. CNA’s network of correspondents shines a light on stories from their corners of the world, from groundbreaking events to up-and-coming trends.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Fact Vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Why is the Philippines dubbed as "Patient Zero" in the global information epidemic? We investigate ecosystems exacerbating disinformation and polarisation in the country.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: Two housemaids and a driver take shelter at their employer's mansion when a zombie outbreak happens one night. Can they all survive the night?

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Funeral Vigil
programme.desc: Night vigils are done at funerals as the souls are said to linger three days after death. Si is a gambler who only goes home when he needs money from his mother and is not around when she dies. When he learns that his mother has buried treasure at home, Si returns to keep a vigil for her in order to find the treasure. Strange things start to occur…

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: On Halloween
programme.desc: A journalist investigates the truth behind a series of brutal deaths and mysterious disappearances. They all lead back to an urban legend about a creepy clown that has stalked the woods of a park for over a hundred years, where horrific events keep happening.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A man is threatened by the spirits inhabiting an abandoned home. A legendary child-snatching cryptid is captured on a security camera in Bolivia.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: Ten years after a young mother allegedly abandoned her family, her mother-in-law reveals a shocking secret: she believes both of her daughter-in-law's lovers murdered her.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Small-town detectives are frightened by what may come next after a young girl is brutally murdered in the woods; with a chance encounter and a digital trail, they must catch the child murderer at large.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S1)
programme.desc: One week before her Senior Prom, Queena Phu pulled into her local library. While she was on the phone with her best friend Rachel, the line suddenly went dead. Rachel and Queena’s family detail the horror.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: Five young lives are ruined when a plan to score some easy money goes horribly wrong.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After the gruesome murder of an aspiring actor in Georgia, police quickly run out of leads. But a new digital forensic tool breathes new life into the investigation.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: Leon Jacob is currently serving a life sentence. He was found guilty of plotting, along with his girlfriend, Valerie McDaniel, the murder of his ex-girlfriend and Valerie's ex-husband.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A man is threatened by the spirits inhabiting an abandoned home. A legendary child-snatching cryptid is captured on a security camera in Bolivia.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, one man is killed and another is injured when a dispute over stolen marijuana plants turns deadly.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A car chase transpires to rescue a hostage being held at gunpoint. After being shocked by 14,000 volts of electricity, a man's chance of survival is in the hands of his friend.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie's husband, Irv, has recently been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease and has already taken two dangerous falls in the house where the EMTs could not get to him.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a judge sets a mom straight on her murderer son; a defense attorney is held in contempt; a convicted felon faces the cop he shot in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: deputies assaulted during a hearing; courtroom chaos after a sentencing; a murderer's wife turns state's witness; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: A man is gunned down in broad daylight and detectives learn it could be connected to another homicide. A teenage girl is lured to her death by someone she considered a friend.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When a man is shot on the side of the road, clues lead Detective Jason White to an ongoing crime spree in his 100th case for Tulsa Homicide.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: OJ’s behaviour sparks a media frenzy, culminating in a high-profile trial. His ongoing violence raises concerns about what happened to Sydney and Justin.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Shocking first-hand accounts of people who were manipulated, abused, and finally broke free before it was too late. We'll hear from former members of Gwen Shamblin's Remnant Fellowship, and more.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: The spirit of a departed child leaves its handprint on a couple's mirror. A ghost takes control of a willing paranormal investigator's neck. A woman spots what appears to be a mermaid in a local lake.
